author: Neuro Assassin
install_msg:
Thank you for downloading this cog.
Small warning: this cog can sometimes you up rate limits (depending how fast you play), so be careful while playing.
name: minesweeper
short:
Allows you to play Minesweeper inside of Discord!
Small warning: this cog can sometimes you up rate limits (depending how fast you play), so be careful while playing.
description:
This cog allows a Discord User to play the game Minesweeper inside of a text channel.
Small warning: this cog can sometimes you up rate limits (depending how fast you play), so be careful while playing.
